manifest:
alias gcl='git clone'
cd ../../hardware/qcom-caf/msm8996-ysl/ && rm -rf audio media display && gcl --single-branch https://github.com/Jabiyeff/android_hardware_qcom_media media && gcl --single-branch https://github.com/Jabiyeff/android_hardware_qcom_display display && gcl https://github.com/LineageOS/android_hardware_qcom_audio --single-branch -b lineage-18.1-caf-msm8996 audio && rm -rf vendor/codeauroa/telephony && gcl https://github.com/wave-project/vendor_codeaurora_telephony --depth=1 --single-branch vendor/codeaurora/telephony/
